00015 //! \file

00018 #ifndef INCL_PLPPM

00020 
00021 typedef struct _PpmHeader
00022 {
00023     int ImageType;           // Image Type
00024     int ImageWidth;          // Image Width
00025     int ImageHeight;         // Image Height

00027 
00028 } PPMHEADER;
00029
